Reviews.Title: im enjoying it
Reviews.Author: Geldon
Reviews.Content: this phone is amazing. the photo is wrong and they have to change it. is very lite, very fast, take nice pictures, looks very good for the price

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: carlos antonio ardila quintero
Reviews.Content: very good is a strong and very good, inexpensive and comfortable product that can meet the expectations of the buyer

Reviews.Title: Gran cel /great cell phone
Reviews.Author: María Yánez
Reviews.Content: Me encantó. es un gran teléfono. la cámara la calidad del video y la música es simplemente genial!I loved it, it is a great phone. the camera, the video, the music... everything is just fine.
